name: Linearity
title: linearity.io
shortDescription: Linearity offers a suite of design tools tailored for Apple devices, focusing on illustrators, designers, and creative professionals. The software features a modern interface that syncs across all Apple devices, enhancing productivity and creativity on the go. Key features include Auto Trace for vectorizing images and AI-powered editing tools, providing complete creative control. Ideal for creating marketing materials, branding, and digital content with customizable templates.
pros: Intuitive interface designed for Apple devices
Advanced features like Auto Trace and AI editing
Syncs across all Apple devices for seamless workflow
cons: May have a learning curve for new users
Potential high cost for premium features

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Canva
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Simpler interface and broader template selection
